org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.coord
Class AeCoordinationManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeManagerAdapter
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.coord.AeCoordinationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeCoordinationManager, IAeCoordinationManagerInternal, IAeManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeInMemoryCoordinationManager, AePersistentCoordinationManager
public abstract class AeCoordinationManager
extends AeManagerAdapter
implements IAeCoordinationManagerInternal

Base class of the coordination manager implementation.

Method Detail

notifyCoordinatorsParticipantClosed

public void notifyCoordinatorsParticipantClosed(long aProcessId)
Description copied from interface: IAeCoordinationManagerInternal
Notifies the coordinators that a subprocess particpant has closed and therefore the coordinators are no longer reachable through compensation.

Specified by:
notifyCoordinatorsParticipantClosed in interface IAeCoordinationManagerInternal
Parameters:
aProcessId -
See Also:
IAeCoordinationManagerInternal.notifyCoordinatorsParticipantClosed(long)

onProcessCompleted

public void onProcessCompleted(long aProcessId,
                               IAeFault aFaultObject,
                               boolean aNormalCompletion)
Handler for Process Manager events. The process manager will call this method when a process that participating in a coordination has completed.

Specified by:
onProcessCompleted in interface IAeCoordinationManagerInternal
Parameters:
aFaultObject - fault object if the process completed with a fault.
aNormalCompletion - indiciates that the process completed normally and is eligible fo compensation.
aProcessId -

hasCoordinatorsAndParticipant

private boolean hasCoordinatorsAndParticipant(java.util.List aCoordinatingObjects)
Returns true if the process coordinating objects contains both coordinator objects and a participant object. This means that the process itself is a subprocess and is also the parent of other subprocesses.

Parameters:
aCoordinatingObjects -

createContext

protected abstract AeCoordinationContext createContext(IAeCreateContextRequest aCtxRequest,
                                                       IAeCoordinationId aId,
                                                       IAeProtocolState aInitState,
                                                       int aRole)
                                                throws AeCoordinationException
Creates and registers the given context given the context. The coordination id is normally null for Coordinators since this method will generate a new id.

Parameters:
aCtxRequest -
aId - coordination id. Required for participants.
aRole - coordinator or paticipant role.
Returns:
coordination context.
Throws:
AeCoordinationException

getCoordinatingIterator

protected java.util.Iterator getCoordinatingIterator(java.util.Collection aCollection,
                                                     java.lang.String aCoordinationId)
                                              throws AeCoordinationNotFoundException
Convenience method to return the iterator to a collection if the collection is not empty. If the collection is empty, then this method will throw AeCoordinationNotFoundException exception.

Parameters:

aCoordinationId -
Returns:
Iterator to collection.
Throws:
AeCoordinationNotFoundException
